MENU (dynamic) [FML].description: A dynamic Menu snippet from a datasource

body:
<MENU>
    <ITEM title="main.xml" subtitle="Relative Link" icon="developer_board" url="templates/main.xml"/>
    <ITEM title="https://fml.dev" subtitle="Absolute Link" icon="insert_link" url="https://fml.dev"/>
</MENU>
MENU (static) [FML].description: A static Menu snippet with 2 items
